summary: Simple Female Imperial with Khajiit ears and tail.
descriptionHtml:
This was my first attempt at creating a race, Made for a thief build. Equips armor same as Khajiit.
<br /><br />Skills : Sneak 10, Pickpocket 5, Lock picking 5, Speech 5,  Light Armor 5 and Archery 5
<br /><br />Spells : "Nekonohirune" permanent ~ All skills improve <10>% faster.
<br /><br />            PowerImperialPacify 
<br /><br />            RaceImperial 
<br /><br />            RaceKhajiitClaws
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Pros: Tail works perfectly with crouch, good for lower level unarmed combat 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Cons: Has both human and car ears as i could not figure out how to remove, easily hidden with longer hair styles. Maybe a bit Over powered but w/e.
<br />The face Texture and ear texture are not mine and i don't remember where i got them was about 14 months ago i made this race so didn't mean to steal anything and not taking credit.
author: Technikatwo
